reviewText: when I was a kid I used to watch it ALL the time, and now I get to see my childhood all over again!
The family loved this movie and watched it several times and our child had friends over to watch it as well.
I have really nothing much to say about this expect that its a dvd and my kids love it. It came in good time and its what they wanted.
this poduct arrived when it said it would with no complications, bought it as a gift for a friend's son who is turning 7.
The boys love it . They watch it all the time. Would recommend for anyone who has kids that like Sonic.
